parsedResumeData.parsedResumeHtml:
PArthiban K

Business Analyst

(+91) 7708111632

 kpb2390@gmail.com

                                                               

PROFILE SUMMARY                                                

 

➢       A Business Analyst with 6+  years experience in Agile Method, Business Analysis, GUI, Requirement Analyzing and Gathering, Business and Functional Requirement Documentation, User Stories preparation, UML Diagram representation ,SQL Server, Client relationship management and User Manual Preparing.

➢       Extenisvely having 3 years experience in US Income Tax Filing Returns. Worked as Junior accountant in Pokma Automobiles pvt ltd for an year.

➢       Elicit requirements using interviews, document analysis, requirements workshops, surveys, site visits, business process descriptions, use cases, scenarios, business analysis, task and workflow analysis.

➢       Evaluate information gathered from multiple sources, reconcile conflicts, decompose high-level information into details, abstract up from low-level information to a general understanding, and distinguish user requests from the underlying true needs.

➢       Define and document the Scope of Work and Functional & Non functional requirements Specifications and finalize the requirements with stakeholders and communicate the Solution to Developers ,other respective Stakeholders.

➢       Develop Test Cases, Test Scenarios & Testing,  Issue Management and Implementations.

➢       Responsible for the final deliverables to the client, conducting appropriate reviews cycles and walkthroughs to complete Cusomer handoff.

➢       Participate in pre-sales activities, presentations and demos to internal and external stakeholders as and when required.

 

TECHNICAL SKILLS                                                               

 

Business Analysis Skills

Problem Solving, Requirement Elicitation, Critical Thinking, UML Diagrams, Mockup Design and Documentation

Documentation Skills

Business Requirement Document, Software specification document, Functional Requirement Document, Product Requirement Document, Use Case Document, User Stories.

Database

SQL Server

Business Analytics Tools

Power Business Intelligence (BI) and Tableau

Modeling Tool

Pencil, MS Visio 2013, BalsamiQ Mockups 3, Lucidchart

Tools And Utilities

JIRA, TFS,MS Office Products

SDLC

AGILE Methodology and Waterfall model

Language

HTML, CSS and Java Script

Certification

Salesforce Administrator, Salesforce Service Cloud, ERP 9.0 Tally

 

EDUCATION                                                    

 

B.C.A – Bachelor Of Computer Application

Ramakrishna Mission Vivekananda College(Autonomous),Chennai

 

ICMAI – Foundation

Institute of Cost and Management Accountants of India

 

 

EXPERIENCE                                                    

Business Analyst

Wilco Source Technologies Pvt Ltd  / Nov 2019 - Present

 

Project – Ford Trade Club Sales Development Kit (Nexus After Market Solutions, UK)

Ford DRS is a cloud application which helps to provides the detailed view of Trade club sales made to Garage members by Dealers. Application helps us to design the marketing templates which enhances the sales to each dealers by providing adequate discount to customers.

 

Responsiblities:

➢       Requirement Discussion with Account managers(Cient) in Nexus after market  to gather business requirements.

➢       Preparation of Wireframe, Activity diagrams to agree the process flow of module.

➢       Compose the Functional specification document and share it Account manager to review the spec. Client feedbacks will be updated in FRD and convert them into user stories.

➢       Creation of Epics, Tasks and Sub tasks in JIRA and prioritize them and plan for Sprint.

➢       Presentation of User stories for each tasks to Development team, QA team and Database. Upload the user stories in respective JIRA Tickets.

➢       Perform Testing After deployment in Test Server and before Demo to Client.

➢       Erstwhile, Development completed and approved by QA team. Then I will show the demo to Account manager(Client).

Project – Wilco Docx

Wilco Docx is an cloud application fetches the Patient Documents from Nuxeo server. Pharmacists splits the pages and assigns the document to user based on the Drugs. Google vision OCR tool recognize and reads data. Validates and accepts the form. Exports the data to patient connect using Salesforce API. Creates record in the salesforce object

 

Responsiblities:

➢       Requirements meetings with Eversana BSA to get business requirements.

➢       Prepared Functioal Specification Document, User Guide and Work Flow diagram and agreed with stakeholder for signoff.

➢       Requirements split into User stories, Priotized and created those as tickets in JIRA.

➢       Presented it to developers to proceed with development.

➢       Performed Testing post deployment and produce that to client for demo.

Business Analyst

Care Data Infomatics Pvt Ltd / Jul 2017 – Nov 2019

 

Project – Care LabTrak (Laboratory Management System)

Care LabTrak is a cloud data management (SAAS model) provides comprehensive features for Laboratory from Patient registration, Sample collection to dispatching the final reports.

 

Responsiblities:

➢      Gather requirements from clients through interview in an iterative method .

➢      Analyze the requests, Identify the requirements and prepare Product requirement document, Use cases documents, User stories, wireframes and UML diagrams. Agree the process flow with stake holders.

➢      Prioritize the requirements , Plan with stakeholders and publish the release plan to all stakeholders in each sprint.

➢      Organize sessions with stakeholders, present the requirements essential for development. Review tests cases scenarios and provides feedback.

➢      Involves in regular scrum meeting to observe the status of tasks.During the release, involve in Triage meeting to correct the priorities amongst bugs.

➢      Post Release, educate the implementation and sales team about release features.Implementation team will showcase the demo to client.

➢      Maintain the requirement traceability matrix document to ensure the requirements and change requests will be mapped to test cases to make sure the requirements covered for testing.

➢      Analyzed requirements for Mobile Application-Home collection, Doctor Approval application.  Devised functional and non functional requirement document , Activity diagrams and validated with stakeholders and signed off from development team.

➢      LIMS Dashboard has been designed using Power BI (Business Intelligence) and Tableau.

 

Project – Inventory (Pharmaceutical Management System)

Inventory is an cloud data management, which used to Store and organize the data related to Drugs, Reagents and Containers extensively used by Laboratories, Pharmacy.

Consumptions of Medications, Reagents, Containers and others has been automated. Stock View Dashboard has been designed using Power BI.

Responsiblities:

➢       Requirement Eliciting and Requirement gathering from the client. Analysed Business Process and Draw BPMN 2.0 in Lucid Chart

➢      Writing Business Requirement Specifications that successfully delivered necessary change in a manageable and non-intrusive way

➢      Designed Use Case diagram, DFD Diagram,ERP Diagram and Class Diagram

➢      Design and develop a systematic business plan as per the clients' specifications

➢      Interacting with Client,Project Manager and development team to develop the application

Business Analyst

Jeevan Technologies Pvt Ltd / Jul 2015 – Jul 2017

 

Project – Tax Garden

TaxGarden aims at providing the Individual income tax filing returns for the US peoples. We gathered the requirement from IRS websites and designed the TaxGarden online software and got certified from IRS. This product is aiming at providing tax filing services to 46 US States with currently providing filing services live for Federal, New York, Georgia, New Jersey, Illinois, Michigan and California residents.

Responsibilities:

➢      Analysing the Form 1040 and their sub schedules instructions

➢      Elicitation of Business requirements for our online Tax product ‘Tax Garden’.

➢      Prepare functional requirements regarding schedules and represent them through business flows, UML diagrams and preparation of Business Specification document.

➢      Responsible for the following documents; Business requirement document, Functional/ Specification document, training and presentation of materials related to Tax domain specific for development.

➢      Assist the project manager and development lead in every sprint planning for effective delivery of the module.

➢      Coordinate with QA team in functional and UAT testing.

➢      Tax Garden is an online based application facilitating US individuals to file their tax return.

➢      The functioning of Tax1040 project is done on an agile methodology basis (Sprint model) by conducting daily scrums and also organizing weekly Status updates regarding the Sprint updates.

➢      Tax Garden competes with other higher end competitor products from Intuit and H&R Block.

 

Senior Tax Executive

Xpitax Solutions Pvt Ltd / Dec 2011 – Jul 2015

Responsibilities:

➢      Preparation of Tax Returns for form 1040 (Individual tax), Form 1041 (Fiduciary) and Form 1065 (Partnership).

➢      Performing Quality Check on returns prepared by the team and filing the same

➢      Training fresh individuals on specific topics related to the taxation and assisting to the team.

➢      Compliance of specifications received from Operating Office relating to the work.

➢      Ensuring achievement of production and quality targets.

➢      Monitoring and assisting the quality of the work done by the team.

➢      Providing solutions to the technical queries of the team.

➢      Comfortable with tax specialized software like Profx, Lacerte, Pro Series, Ultratax, Drake and Go System.

➢      Overall control over the preparers who engage in the preparation of tax returns.

➢      To address the queries of the preparers and execute the best solution as appropriate.

➢      Regular check on the flow of Tax returns on a particular day.

➢      To simulate the work flow continuously and to allocate the tax returns based on priority.

 

Junior Accountant

Pokma Automobiles Pvt Ltd / Jan 2011 – Dec 2011

 

Responsibilities:

•          Efficient maintainence of integrity of General ledger, Balance sheet and Profit & Loss Accounts.

•          Recording the Journal entries in daily manner.

•          Administration of Accounts receivable and accounts payable

•          Monitored, recorded, and banked cash and checks as well as reconciled records of bank transactions.

•          Filing of Quarterly TDS and Performed the computation of salary through payroll software.

 

PERSONAL DETAILS                                                

D.O.B                                05th Mar, 1990.

Languages Known          Tamil and English

Marital Status                 Married

Interests                          Music and Sports

Address                          148, Thazamboo street, DLB nagar, Putlur, Thiruvallur - 602025
